item.title: PillowRecord
item.author: LiuDongdong
item.description: extensive file format support, an efficient internal representation, and fairly powerful image processing capabilities. The core image library is designed for fast access to data stored in a few basic pixel formats. Image Arhives, image Dsplay, image processing 0. Concept .1. Bands The Python Imaging Library allows you to store several bands in a single image, provided they all have the same dimensions and depth. For example, a PNG image
